item.title: 部长称智利将抑制预算增长，因为 Codelco 公司正在加速复苏
item.description: 智利新任财政部长周三告诉路透社，在国营的世界最大铜矿商 Codelco 公司努力从最近的生产问题中恢复过来的同时，智利将制定一个 "负责任的 "2026 年预算，增幅有限。【原文：Chile will have a "responsible" 2026 budget with a limited increase while state-run Codelco, the world's largest copper miner, seeks to recover from recent production problems, the country's new finance minister told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 交易日：股市降温，商品激荡
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量。【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets.】

item.title: 莱索托称美国计划将非洲贸易协定延长一年
item.description: 莱索托贸易部长周三在结束对华盛顿的访问后表示，美国计划将《非洲增长与机会法案》（AGOA）的有效期延长一年，该法案给予非洲大陆进入美国市场的优惠待遇。【原文：Lesotho's trade minister said on Wednesday that the U.S. plans to extend the African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA), which gives the continent preferential access to U.S. markets, by a year, after returning from a visit to Washington.】

item.title: 纳斯达克称 9 月中旬空头兴趣上升 1.1
item.description: 纳斯达克交易所周三表示，9月中旬纳斯达克指数的空头兴趣上升了1.1%。【原文：Short interest on the Nasdaq rose 1.1% in mid-September, the exchange said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团全年利润下降 4.3
item.description: 新西兰恒天然集团（Fonterra）周四报告称，其全年利润下降了4.3%，原因是在改变了对农民股东分红的处理方式后，税费支出增加。【原文：New Zealand's Fonterra reported a 4.3% fall in its full-year profit on Thursday, weighed down by a higher tax expense after changes to how it treats farmer shareholder distributions.】

item.title: 美国对医疗设备、机器人和工业机械开启关税调查
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，已对个人防护设备、医疗用品、机器人和工业机械的进口展开新的国家安全调查。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Wednesday it has opened new national security investigations into the import of personal protective equipment, medical items, robotics and industrial machinery.】

item.title: 花旗集团向墨西哥亿万富翁 Fernando Chico Pardo 出售 Banamex 25% 的股份
item.description: 花旗集团周三表示，已同意向费尔南多-奇科-帕尔多（Fernando Chico Pardo）及其直系亲属拥有的一家公司出售 Grupo Financiero Banamex 的股权，这标志着该公司向计划剥离该部门迈出了一步。【原文：Citigroup said on Wednesday it has agreed to sell an equity stake in Grupo Financiero Banamex to a company owned by Fernando Chico Pardo and his immediate family, marking a step toward the firm's planned divestiture of the unit.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：医药中间商提议修改监管规定，以规避特朗普政府的规定
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引熟悉讨论情况的人士的话报道称，药房中间商正在制定一项提案，以改变他们的一些商业行为，避免受到特朗普政府的新监管。【原文：Pharmacy middlemen are working on a proposal to change some of their business practices to avoid new regulation from the Trump administration, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，迪士尼股东要求说明金梅尔停职的原因
item.description: 据 Semafor 周三报道，一群华特迪士尼股东要求该公司交出与上周决定暂停吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）节目相关的文件。【原文：A group of Walt Disney shareholders is demanding that the company turn over documents related to its decision to suspend Jimmy Kimmel's show last week, Semafor reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 为挽救老化的太空望远镜，NASA 找来初创公司将其推向更远的太空
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）和Katalyst公司表示，NASA已委托初创公司Katalyst发射一个航天器，将一个价值5亿美元的轨道观测站从坠入地球大气层的危险中拯救出来，该航天器的目的是将它推向更远的太空。【原文：NASA has tapped startup Katalyst to save a $500 million orbiting observatory from falling into Earth's atmosphere by launching a spacecraft meant to push it farther into space, NASA and Katalyst said.】

item.title: 美联储戴利：可能需要进一步降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周三表示，她 "完全支持 "美联储上周下调政策利率的决定，并认为可能有必要进一步降息。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said on Wednesday that she "fully supported" the decision by the Fed to cut its policy rate last week and that further reductions would likely be necessary.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英特尔寻求苹果投资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，英特尔公司已与苹果公司进行接触，商讨对这家陷入困境的芯片制造商进行投资的事宜。【原文：Intel has approached Apple about securing an investment in the struggling chipmaker, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 官方就业数据备受关注，DoubleLine 多管齐下应对美国经济
item.description: 美国债券公司 DoubleLine 周三表示，由于担心美国劳工部劳工统计局公布的数据质量下降，该公司正在使用各种官方和私人数据来源来评估美国经济的健康状况。【原文：U.S. bond firm DoubleLine said on Wednesday it is using a variety of official and private data sources to assess the health of the U.S. economy, as it is worried about a decline in the quality of data published by the Labor Department's Bureau of Labor Statistics.】

item.title: 报道称，美国为 400 名被国土资源部解雇的房地产工人提供重返工作岗位的选择
item.description: 据媒体报道，作为特朗普政府提高效率行动的一部分，美国总务管理局正在为今年早些时候解雇的 400 名房地产管理工作人员提供重返岗位的选择。【原文：The U.S. General Services Administration is offering 400 real estate management workers fired earlier this year as part of the Trump administration's efficiency drive the option to return to their roles, according to media reports.】

item.title: 阿根廷 7 月经济活动增长 2.9
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，阿根廷 7 月份的经济活动与去年同期相比增长了 2.9%。【原文：Argentina's economic activity grew 2.9% in July compared with the same month last year, official data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普将于周四签署 TikTok 协议
item.description: 一位白宫知情人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周四签署 TikTok 协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will sign the TikTok deal on Thursday, a White House source with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，美联储主席古尔斯比称美国就业市场稳定，警告不要激进降息
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，美国就业市场仍然 "基本稳定和稳固"，并对一系列降息措施提出警告。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the U.S. jobs market remains "mostly steady and solid" and warned against a series of interest rate cuts, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国邮政局将不会寻求在一月份提高邮票价格
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（U.S. Postal Service）周三表示，将不会在一月份提高一等邮件的邮票价格。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said on Wednesday it will not seek to raise first-class mail stamp prices in January.】

item.title: Tether 任命前谷歌和 Limestone 高管为首席商务官
item.description: 加密货币巨头 Tether 公司周三表示，已任命本杰明-哈贝尔（Benjamin Habbel）为首席业务官，该公司正寻求扩大数字资产以外的投资。【原文：Crypto giant Tether has appointed Benjamin Habbel as its chief business officer, the company said on Wednesday, as it looks to broaden its investments beyond digital assets.】

item.title: 美国各州称应拒绝 Capital One 与储户达成的 4.25 亿美元和解协议
item.description: 一个由美国 18 个州组成的两党团体告诉联邦法官，Capital One 与感觉被高利率欺骗的储户达成的 4.25 亿美元和解协议应予以驳回，因为它让银行继续亏待客户。【原文：A bipartisan group of 18 U.S. states told a federal judge that Capital One's $425 million settlement with depositors who felt cheated out of high interest rates should be rejected, because it lets the bank continue short-changing customers.】

item.title: 奥鲁比斯美国铜回收厂投产
item.description: 欧洲最大的铜生产商奥鲁比斯公司（Aurubis AG）周三表示，该公司在美国佐治亚州里士满新建的金属回收厂已开始生产。【原文：Aurubis AG , Europe's largest copper producer, said on Wednesday it had started production at its newly built U.S. metal recycling plant at Richmond in Georgia.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，日本东京海上与 OpenAI 合作开发人工智能代理
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，日本保险公司 Tokio Marine Holdings 正在与 OpenAI 合作开发人工智能代理，利用深入的数据分析来改进产品规划和处理客户咨询。【原文：Japanese insurer Tokio Marine Holdings is partnering with OpenAI to develop AI agents that use in-depth data analysis to improve product planning and field customer inquiries, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国拟取消 130 亿美元绿色能源基金
item.description: 美国能源部周三表示，打算取消拜登政府承诺用于补贴风能、太阳能、电池和电动汽车的 130 多亿美元资金。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy intends to cancel more than $13 billion in funds that the Biden administration had pledged to subsidize wind, solar, batteries and electric vehicles, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称七国集团权衡稀土价格下限以对抗中国的主导地位
item.description: 七国集团（G7）的四位知情人士告诉路透社记者，七国集团和欧盟正在考虑制定价格下限以促进稀土生产，并对中国的部分出口产品征税以激励投资。【原文：Group of Seven (G7) members and the European Union are considering price floors to promote rare earth production, as well as taxes on some Chinese exports to incentivise investment, four sources with knowledge of the discussions told Reuters.】

item.title: MSNBC 签订协议，将天空新闻报道引入美国
item.description: 有线电视新闻网 MSNBC 周三表示，它已与天空新闻台（Sky News）签订了一份多年协议，将其全球报道带给美国观众，以加强新闻业务。【原文：Cable news network MSNBC said on Wednesday it has signed a multi-year deal with Sky News to bring its global reporting to U.S. audiences, in an effort to strengthen news operations.】

item.title: 本田将停产由通用汽车在美国组装的讴歌电动车
item.description: 日本汽车制造商本田将停止在美国生产由通用汽车公司组装的讴歌 ZDX 电动跨界车。【原文：Japanese automaker Honda is ceasing production in the U.S. of its Acura ZDX electric crossovers assembled by General Motors .】

item.title: 美国支持提振阿根廷股票、债券和比索
item.description: 美国对哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统领导下的南美政府推动改革的支持有了更多细节，阿根廷陷入困境的债券、股票和比索货币在周三连续第三天上涨。【原文：Argentina's embattled bonds, stocks and peso currency gained for a third day on Wednesday after more details were shared on U.S. support for the reform push by the South American government under President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 波音公司将F/A-18服役期改装工作迁出圣路易斯
item.description: 波音公司周三表示，将把F/A-18战斗机的服役期改装工作迁出圣路易斯地区，以支持其未来项目的扩展计划。【原文：Boeing said on Wednesday it would relocate F/A-18 fighter jet's service life modification work out of the St. Louis region to support its expansion plans for future programs.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Modular 融资 2.5 亿美元，欲挑战英伟达的主导地位
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Modular周三表示，它在一轮融资中筹集了2.5亿美元，估值达16亿美元，旨在挑战英伟达（Nvidia）在人工智能计算市场的软件垄断地位。【原文：AI startup Modular said on Wednesday it raised $250 million in a funding round valuing it at $1.6 billion, as it aims to challenge Nvidia's software stranglehold on the AI computing market.】

item.title: 微软将人类学人工智能模型引入 365 Copilot，实现 OpenAI 以外的多元化发展
item.description: 微软周三表示，将把 Anthropic 公司的人工智能模型整合到其 Copilot 助手中，这表明这家软件巨头正在努力减少对其与 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 的高调合作关系的依赖。【原文：Microsoft said on Wednesday it will integrate artificial intelligence models from Anthropic into its Copilot assistant, signaling the software giant's push to reduce dependence on its high-profile partnership with ChatGPT maker OpenAI.】
